text: Gerda van Cleemput (25 November 1935 â€“ 28 September 2022) was a Belgian chidren's book author.Jeugdauteur Gerda van Cleemput (86) overleden, hln.be, 3 october 2022Provincie Antwerpen verliest twee jeugdauteurs: Gerda van Cleemput (86) en Gaston Van Camp (83) overleden, VRT, 3 october 2022 Van Cleemput received the "Prijs voor het Verdienstelijke Kinderboek" (translated: Prize for the Meritorious Children's Book) in 1967 and the "Jongerenprijs Boekenweek" (translated: Youth Prize Book Week) in 1969. Later she was awarded with the .Gerda Van Cleemput Jongerenprijs Boekenweek 1969, dbnl.org Van Cleemput died in Antwerp on September 28, 2022. ==References== Category:Belgian writers Category:2022 deaths Category:1930 births
title: Gerda van Cleemput
